page.title: 03Wootton Parish Church
page.content: In the centre of Wootton village lies the impressive parish church of St Mary the Virgin.The church was built in the thirteenth century.At about 1237 the church was dedicated to Saint Mary the Virgin and the ceremony of its dedication is always held on September 8. In the church there is a tablet commemorating the marrage on August 20 1879 of the Victorian diarist Robert Francis Kilvert to Elizabath Anne Rowland of Holly Bank Wootton.The patrons of the church are New College Oxford. The church is only a short distance from the village school.At Harvest and Christmas the children hold services in the church to which their parents and villages attend.
